    DatapackRegistrar.Configurer
    DatapackRegistrar.Configurer.autoEnableOnServerStart(boolean autoEnableOnServerStart)
    Sets whether this pack is going to be automatically enabled on server starts even if previously disabled.
    DatapackRegistrar.Configurer
    DatapackRegistrar.Configurer.position(boolean fixed, Datapack.Position position)
    Configures the position in the load order of this datapack.
    DatapackRegistrar.Configurer
    DatapackRegistrar.Configurer.title(Component title)
    Changes the title of the datapack from the default which is just the "id" in the registerPack methods.
